titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the gentry, ministers, and freeholders of the county of York, assembled at the assizes there holden. Presented to His Majestie the 5. of April 1642. Together with His Majesties speech at the presenting thereof. And his gracious answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
